title: low priority queue bug
body: So my internet went out during a game. It keeps on making me wait 5 mins before each of my games so could some one help me please. it makes me sad af. {{champion:84}}

replies.body: i have the same issue before EVERY ROUND i have to wait 5 min and i only logged off once because i have a life.

Wow that really sucks that you ended up with a low priority queue just because your internet went out, but those four other team mates were still left without a fifth member. I can't do much about those LPQ's here on the boards, but also keep in mind that you won't end up with a LPQ after having only left one game.
